
## UyghurScript paper

---

### 1. create

> 📝:  create func of paper module

> 🔙: Value

> 🛒: 
* w  `int`
* h  `int`


### 2. copy

> 📝:  copy func of paper module

> 🔙: Value

> 🛒: 
* paper  `RPaper`
* point  `UGPoint`
* size  `UGSize`


### 3. crop

> 📝:  crop func of paper module

> 🔙: Empty

> 🛒: 
* paper  `RPaper`
* point  `UGPoint`
* size  `UGSize`


### 4. read

> 📝:  read func of paper module

> 🔙: Value

> 🛒: 
* path  `CString`


### 5. write

> 📝:  write func of paper module

> 🔙: Empty

> 🛒:
